description: This file defines the NotesViewModel class, which manages UI-related data and interactions for notes within an Android app. It handles loading, searching, adding, updating, and deleting notes by interacting with a NotesRepository and using Kotlin coroutines for asynchronous operations.

classes.name: NotesViewModel
classes.description: ViewModel responsible for handling note data and user interactions in the app.

methods.name: loadNotes
methods.description: Loads all notes from the repository and resets search state.

methods.name: searchNotes
methods.description: Searches for notes matching the given query and updates the displayed list.

methods.name: addNote
methods.description: Adds a new note with specified title and content, updating the internal list.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by id with new title and content.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by id from internal storage and repository.

methods.name: getNoteById
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its id from the internal list.
